Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial investigation into a suspicious sedan, leading him to uncover a Japanese submarine operation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Human Meteor and Duke's taxi service, setting the stage for the unfolding events.

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor and confronts the occupants of a suspicious sedan, escalating the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the confrontation and Duke's plan to investigate further by stowing away on a yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Underwater Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Pete's yacht duty, his discovery of a suspicious chart, and subsequent events leading to Human Meteor's underwater investigation and submarine discovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action
Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Escape
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor's underwater ambush, escape, and retaliatory attack against the submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The immediate aftermath of the underwater battle, leading to investigation, rescue, and a return to normalcy.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin
Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads fighting against Nazis, interwoven with a separate storyline of boys uncovering a Nazi spy ring at a bus company.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads' Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Liberty Lads engaged in a standoff with Nazi forces.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance and the Wallet
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Skip and Chuck witnessing an ambulance arrival and finding a wallet, setting off their investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: Garage Intrigue and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Boys encounter a marine salute, arrive at the garage, and are ambushed by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated, a carbon monoxide poisoning plan is devised, and Major Bronson intervenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Betrayal and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Henchmen attack, Bronson betrays Horst, and helps the boys escape, leading to a final showdown.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help
Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapped President's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Champ and Henry in a South American setting, tasked with rescuing President Rosita's daughter from El Tigre and Nazi agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ and Initial Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and their mission against Nazi agents, followed by initial suspicion in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation and interrogation by officers, followed by the reveal of the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Scheme and Forced Alliance
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's plan is revealed, and the men are forced into an alliance with Rosita's mother to rescue her daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House
Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: Infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, diversionary tactics, and the initial confrontation with El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Personal Vendetta
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation of a smaller man, search for Rosita, and reveal of a personal vendetta against Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission Mobilization and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstanding, urgent news of Rosita's location, mobilization for rescue, and initial combat.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan fighting in a jungle setting, retrieving sub detector plans and dealing with native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and initial report to Captain Lawton.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Disobedience and Jungle Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Officer's disobedience justified by the need to retrieve sub detector plans, followed by jungle infiltration and hidden threats.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: Capture of a native man and Sinister Grauer's commands, leading to torture of Devil Dog Dolan to obtain sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Chaos, and Vengeance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's confession of arson, resulting chaos, and his vow for vengeance after Sam's sacrifice.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Combat and Native Homage
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's fight with natives, defeat of the chief, and surprising homage from the tribe.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Reward
sub_scenes.description: Captain Grauer's dilemma regarding his captured son, followed by Dolan's reward and unusual disciplinary action.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins investigating the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a conspiracy and a medical emergency.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Investigation
sub_scenes.description: Investigation at the police station and hospital, leading to the discovery of Miss Reilly's illness.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Connecting the Dots and Planning the Next Step
sub_scenes.description: Decision to inform Elijah, uncovering Farnacci's gang through news broadcast, and planning to find Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Searching for Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's house, leading to the revelation about Farnacci's motive and Reilly's innocence.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Ambush Escape and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Escape from the ambush, cab chase, and intervention by the Irish neighborhood.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Wait and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the shooting, anxious wait at the hospital, community blood donation, and Lassie's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors
Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
